:Spears:
She comes running around the corner and sees Xiane firing at two 
Pred. She runs up to Xiane,"For get them, let's get out of here, the 
ship is going to fall apart. I need your help in the CR chamber." She 
throws her spear at one of the pred and runs back down the hall.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> {Xiane}
> 
>     Xiane grunted as his sheild took the brunt of the missle and a 
few of
> the lasers, a few of the blasts managed to make it around the 
energy barrier
> to slice across his metalic head, still it took a lot of strength 
to not be
> thrown back by the sheer viciousness of the attack.
> 
>     Shifting forward slowly his eyes locking on the pair darkly, 
sword
> unwaivering before him as he slowly advanced, the energy sheild 
flickering,
> his internal sensors warning him its power to absorb the blasts had 
nearly
> depleted all its power...
